sen.j: 将軍の命で義秀は海に飛び込み、10回往還しながら海底に潜り、三匹の鮫を捕獲して将軍に献じたという。
sen.e: By order of shogun, Yoshihide dived into the sea; he dived to the bottom of the sea and repeated it for ten times, and captured three sharks and presented them to shogun.

sen.j: すると、この名馬は常盛自身が所望していたため、常盛は立ち上がり、相撲ならば弟には負けないと言い出し、砂浜で相撲の対決した。
sen.e: However, this famous horse was what Tsunemori himself had wished for; Tsunemori stood up saying that he would not lose a sumo fight against his younger brother, and the two fought a sumo match on the beach.
